Text: Milking the Stars: A Re-Imagining of Last Patrol:

Triplets: <Dave Wyndorf
2:
--------------------
Text: Milking the Stars: A Re-Imagining of Last Patrol:  The album is not strictly a remix of "Last Patrol"; songs feature new recordings and arrangements aimed at giving the album what Wyndorf describes as "a weird 1960s vibe".
Triplets:<Milking the Stars
3:
--------------------
Text: Milking the Stars: A Re-Imagining of Last Patrol:  The album closes with two live tracks which were recorded at the AB in Brussels in 2014, and which feature the debut performance of the band's new bassist, Chris Kosnik.
Triplets:<Milking the Stars
